verses.roman:
loka 'hari' 'hari' bale, kolāhala haila
'keśava'-sevaka prabhuke mālā parāila

synonyms: loka—all the people; hari hari bale—began to chant the holy names Hari, Hari; kolāhala haila—there was a great uproar; keśava-sevaka—the priest in the service of Lord Keśava; prabhuke—unto Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mālā parāila—offered a garland.
translation: All the people then began to chant "Hari! Hari!" and there was a great uproar. The priest in Lord Keśava's service offered Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu a garland.
